desc: You've found a rhyme that you think is great
You wasted a whole day rhyming "orange" and "orange"
You took a dictionary to find beautiful words, but then you spent a whole day discovering words
At the end of the day you saw that you had too many Jojo references in the text, and you spent the rest of the day deleting the useless one
You saw that your text was too bad, and you decided to work harder on it
You messed up with the conjugation, and decided to take more time for the text
You messed up with the conjugation, but you let it go because it can make it look like an experiment
You didn't do anything all day, and then you remembered that you have a text to do. A lost day :|
